name: Festival at the Gates
preparation:
Rory Toolan’s recipe was inspired by the Slane Castle Music Festival. He let the triple-casked Irish whiskey be the star and added a few other simple ingredients to play up the floral notes of the spirit. The resulting cocktail is boozy and bright—perfect for a festival concert.

Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass with ice and stir until cold.

Strain into a chilled coupe.

Express oil from a grapefruit peel. Place peel on the lip of the glass.
